title: Adobe Type
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150311063634/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150311063634/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Adobe Type**

Adobe Type sells more than 2,200 popular typefaces for individual sale. The entire library, [Font Folio](http://web.archive.org/web/20150311063634/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%20Folio), is available in [OpenType](http://web.archive.org/web/20150311063634/http:/typophile.com/wiki/OpenType) and may also be purchased on CD at a substantial savings. Adobe makes a selection of their library avaiable for students under the title [Adobe Type Classics for Learning](http://web.archive.org/web/20150311063634/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Adobe%20Type%20Classics%20for%20Learning).

Online at [http://www.adobe.com/type/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150311063634/http:/www.adobe.com/type/ "http://www.adobe.com/type/")
author: filip blazek
